pr_title: [Compiler] fix optional Int properties with an uppercase name

timeline.message:
use the field name for class properties, not the schema name

fixes #2541

add built in introspection types to SDL parser

Also:
- remove leading whitespace in block strings
- remove leading trailing quotes when parsing String default values
normalize Json numbers, GraphQL Ints and Floats to Kotlin Double
use SDL schemas for codegen tests

timeline.bodyText: The order change is unfortunate but I don't think it matters a lot. I think it is due to moving to SDL and the order types are parsed. Where would be the good place to enforce iteration order? When parsing the schemas? Generating code? Somewhere else?
timeline.author: martinbonnin

replies.bodyText: It really doesn't matter in the behaviour. We could sort them alphabetically to maintain the order but not sure if it worth doing
replies.author: sav007

replies.bodyText: Ok let's keep this for now.
replies.author: martinbonnin

timeline.message: move the SDL definitions to a separate file
